subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Forward Chris Kreider was sent down to the Hartford Wolfpack, the team’s top minor league affiliate, having not quite convinced Coach Alain Vigneault that he is ready for the N.H.L.
snippet: Forward Chris Kreider was sent down to the Hartford Wolfpack, the team’s top minor league affiliate, having not quite convinced Coach Alain Vigneault that he is ready for the N.H.L.
